visual_enhancers.torana_arch: Use an SVG background on the top of section headers resembling a mango leaf torana.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) - Use for UI elements. For spiritual icons (Om, Swastika, Kalash), use SVGs or 'flaticon' style custom components if needed, but stick to Lucide for interface consistency.

implementation_instructions.step_1: Setup Tailwind config with the custom colors (primary, secondary, accent, stone) and fonts (Ramabhadra, Tenali Ramakrishna, Cinzel, Lato).
implementation_instructions.step_2: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the bilingual toggle state and passes it down.
implementation_instructions.step_3: Build the 'SevaCard' component using the Bento Grid pattern.
implementation_instructions.step_4: Implement the 'DevoteeRegistration' form with 'Stone Grey' backgrounds and 'Deep Maroon' borders.
implementation_instructions.step_5: Create the 'Ticket' view using the 'torn_paper' clip-path style.
implementation_instructions.general_rule: Always prioritize the bilingual aspect. Every text label MUST have a Telugu equivalent. Use a utility function 't(key, lang)' to switch.

principles: Buttons must have a distinct hover state (lift + shadow).
Do not use default generic centered layouts; use the 'Bento Sacred' grid.
anti_patterns: Don't use pure black (#000000). Use #1A1A1A or #2D1B0E.
Don't use standard blue for links. Use Maroon or Gold.
